column4: QUESTION about wifi. Everytime I log on the wifi manager connects to an AP that I don't want. Is there a way to prioritize the APs like in windows?
<mophead> in reverse? it makes your lower case even lower?
I mean in the sense that when the caps lock light is on I get lowercase, and when it's off I get UPPERCASE.
I mean in the sense that when the caps lock light is on I get lowercase, and when it's off I get UPPERCASE.  Is there a way to fix that?
